DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Travel along the route, adjusting speed to arrive at the last point on the route at the specified simulation time. A hold pattern will be executed at the start of the route, if the arrival time is too far in the future.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>route</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Route</myLabel> <myToolTip>Route to move along.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Lines</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtLinesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>timeOnTarget</myVariableName> <myType>time</myType> <myLabel>Time On Target</myLabel> <myToolTip>Arrival time for the end of the route</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
